sentences.en: "What time were you planning lunch?"—"Half past twelve, if that's convenient."
sentences.cn: “你打算什么时候吃午饭？”“如果方便的话，12点半。”

sentences.en: A meeting would take place at a mutually convenient time.
sentences.cn: 会议拟在双方都方便的时候召开。

sentences.en: Come at any time that is convenient to you.
sentences.cn: 你哪会儿方便就哪会儿来吧.

sentences.en: I have to find a convenient location for the shelves.
sentences.cn: 我得找一合适的地方放这些书架.

sentences.en: Is it convenient for you to go out tonight?
sentences.cn: 今晚你方便出去 吗 ?

sentences.en: It does seem a bit convenient, doesn't it?
sentences.cn: 这看起来确实省事，对吧？

sentences.en: It is very convenient to pay by credit card.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡付款非常方便。

sentences.en: Leaving aside the question of privacy, constant surveillance can be remarkably convenient.
sentences.cn: 如果不去管隐私问题的话，实施不间断监视其实是非常便利的。

sentences.en: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.cn: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.en: May I come and talk with you whenever it's convenient?
sentences.cn: 在你方便时我能来和你谈谈 吗 ?

sentences.en: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.cn: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.en: Online shopping is both cheap and convenient.
sentences.cn: 网上购物既便宜又方便。

sentences.en: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.cn: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

sentences.en: The bus stop around the corner is probably the most convenient.
sentences.cn: 拐角处的那个公共汽车站可能是最方便的。

sentences.en: The school is at convenient distance from my home.
We cannot make this minority a convenient excuse to turn our backs.
sentences.cn: 我们不能拿少数这几个人作为一种方便的借口而对此置之不理。

sentences.en: With people around, it wasn't convenient to talk about the matter.
sentences.cn: 周围有人, 不便启齿.

sentences.en: Would this evening be convenient for you?
You can also take red ginseng in convenient tablet or capsule form.
sentences.cn: 你也可以选择便于服用的红参片或红参胶囊。

trans.tran_cn: 实用的，方便的，附近的，省事的
trans.tran_en: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems
